Since September, the Riverside Traditional School campus has demonstrated a 12.2% reduction in their energy usage compared to last school year. They have involved their whole school through a variety of awareness activities including a school wide Energy Conservation Poster Contest, a Persuasive Essay Contest related to choosing the best energy sources for a future city, and efforts to shut down school wide at the end of every school day, weekends, and holidays.

The School of Energy team was invited to participate in the assembly to present winners of the poster contest. There was a surprise visit from the SRP Energy Hog and students were encouraged to conserve energy at home and school and to ‚ÄúBe a Hero, Power Down to Zero‚Äù!
